title: Physical Assessment Skills for Pharmacy Professionals: Online Course Focused on Blood Pressure Measurement Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and pharmaceutical concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education for working professionals. Emphasizing digital equipment utilization and hands-on collaborative practice with peer learners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the manual blood pressure measurement procedure using a stethoscope within one week
Learners can perform blood pressure measurement simulations in an online environment with ≥80% accuracy through peer evaluator collaboration
Learners can interpret and document blood pressure measurement results while incorporating clinical judgment applications in project reports

resources: Digital Blood Pressure Monitor & Stethoscope Kit
Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction Worksheet

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
